data.name: Kulen Community Dayz 2020
data.description: IT Conference, 3 dayz, 67+ sessions and more! KulenDayz is all for meeting people from IT community and sharing experiences from everyday work. Organized by community it keeps a unique style, talks out of standard conference rooms and speakers ready for a discussion.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Shift Developer Conference
relatedRecords.description: The biggest Developer Conference in Southeast Europe. This event, Shift 2020 is the seventh and will bring together more than 1300 attendees. During the two conference days, Shift becomes a meeting place for developers in the most beautiful city in the world.
